snippet: A large gift to the United Nations Counter-Terrorism Center as Islamist militant extremism hits ever closer to home.
abstract: Saudi Arabia donates $100 million to a fledgling United Nations counterterrorism agency and expresses hope that infusion will strengthen its abilities and set an example for other donor countries.
lead_paragraph: A large gift to the United Nations Counter-Terrorism Center as Islamist militant extremism hits ever closer to home.

headline.main: Saudis Give $100 Million to U.N. Fight on Terrorism
headline.print_headline: Saudis Give $100 Million to U.N. Fight on Terrorism

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
